meta.description: Language labels for the Install Tool status reports

languageKey.label: File System
Writable
Required Directory Missing
Directory not existing
Directory should be writable
Directory not writable
%s does not exist.
%s does not exist and could not be created.
Also note that it should be writable, if it did exist.
%s should be writable.
%s must be writable.
